name: OKA Liquid Laundry 1L
excerpt: Concentrated liquid detergent for daily use. Fresh scent, gentle on colours.
description: Powerful stain removal with colour protection. Tested under ISO lab conditions. Suitable for household and small business use.

name: OKA Liquid Laundry 3L
excerpt: Economy 3L size — great value for families and small laundromats.
description: Economy pack for frequent washers. Same formula as 1L concentrated variant.

name: OKA Liquid Laundry 20L
excerpt: Industrial 20L barrel — for commercial laundries and wholesale buyers.
description: Bulk industrial formula with stabilizers for high-volume use.
